biography:
Delia Casanova (born November 4, 1948) is a Mexican film, theater and television actress, winner of a Silver Ariel.

He completed his acting studies at the National Institute of Fine Arts (INBA), in Mexico City. She began her artistic career in the theater, to later venture into the cinema and a decade later into television, as an actress in soap operas, in productions made by Televisa.
name: Delia Casanova
